name: NumWins
displayName: Number of multiplayer wins

name: NumLosses
displayName: Number of losses

name: NumMultiplayerGames
displayName: Number of multiplayer games

name: NumSinglePlayerGames
displayName: Number of single player games

name: 3+RoastBeef
displayName: Sandwiches with 3 or more roast beef

name: TrashedStarters
displayName: Games that trashed all starters before turn 3

name: NumGames
displayName: Multiplayer games + single player games

name: BlockedAttacks
displayName: Number of blocked attacks

name: NumGamesWithFivePlayers
displayName: Number of games played that had 5 players

name: 3BreadSandwiches
displayName: Number of sandwiches that had 3 bread

name: 4+CardsBought
displayName: Turns where 4 or more cards were purchased

name: MaxBreadPoints
displayName: Number of sandwiches with 3 bread, spinach, oil &vinegar, and had a toaster played

name: 60+Points
displayName: Turns where 60 or more points were accumulated

name: NumToastedBread
displayName: Number of bread cards toasted

name: DoubleStraw
displayName: Number of times a straw was used to get a straw, twice

name: 4Flies
displayName: Number of times 4 players were hit by Flies

name: BoughtBreadWithoutPlayingOne
displayName: Turns where a bread was bought when one wasn't played

name: NumDiscardedCards
displayName: Number of cards discarded during a turn. Doesn't count end of turn discard.

name: NumAttacksPlayed
displayName: Number of attack cards played. (Not blocked)

name: NumCardsDrawn
displayName: Number of cards drawn. Not counting your starting hand.

name: 3+BuysNoCheese
displayName: Number of turns where you had 3 or more buys without playing a cheese card.

name: DoubleTurkey
displayName: Number of times turkey was used to gain a turkey.

name: NumTrashedCards
displayName: Number of cards trashed.
